doc.title: The Over-Anxious Waiter
doc.plot: A young couple are dining in a private room, but are constantly interrupted by the waiter, who gives them no opportunity for love-making. Exasperated by the waiter's continued calls, the young man hides behind a porti√®re and when the waiter comes rushing back, the young man uses a siphon of seltzer on him with telling effect.
